metadata.title: CVE-2017-7071 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. Safari before 10.1 isaffected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memorycorruption and application crash) via a crafted web site.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
